channel.title: xKillax 728 | Summoning | Loyalty | Economy | PvM | PvP
channel.description:
[CENTER] LINKS:
[URL=http://"http://www.xkillax.net"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://webclient.xkillax.net"]WebClient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://hiscores.xkillax.net"]Hiscores[/URL]
xKillax is Economy Based
----- General Server -----
*Full Working Summoning *Daily Updates and Bug/Glitch Fixes. *Fully Working Hunter & Dungeoneering with tokens and Shop. *Working Farming, Hunter, Slayer, Construction, and Dungeoneering. *Working Goliath Gloves and Working Polypore Staff. *New Pets & Baby Troll. *TONS of Monsters to PvM *Custom Items such as Black, Pink, Silver Phats, Black masks, and more. *New Npc that teleports you to Frost Dragons, KBD, Glacors, and Mithril Dragons. *Clan Wars White Portal (Safe PK) *You get 100 Loyalty Points every 15 minutes of Gameplay. *Lucky Items Obtained by Voting*NEWEST Items *Perfect Pking server *Perfect skilling *Perfect Switching *Chaotics *Hand Cannon *Pvp Armours + Degrade Times *Pvp Weapons + Degrade Times *Working Rocktails *100% Curses *Slayer Working
----- Bosses -----
*Jadinkos *Glacors *Nex is 100% working *Tormented Demons *GodWars (All Bosses Fully Working *King Black Dragon *Dagannoth Kings *Corporal Beast
----- MiniGames -----
*Warriors Guild *Barrows *Duel Arena *Pest Contro l*Tazhaar *Jad
----- Pking Teleports -----
*Mage Bank *Varrock Pk *Lava Crossing *Edgeville *Green Dragons
Pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aegAcNk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30mww37.jpg[/img]
Summoning working with Infuse-X [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2z25jet.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2CcGgz0.jpg[/img] [/CENTER]
